quoteText: In particular, the organization may impose a delay to deter and protect itself from fraud.

quoteText: The organization guarantees that the funds the user has put in its custody will not be lost in case of bankruptcy of itself or of a third party to whom it has delegated the custody of the funds.

case: Information is provided about security practices
quoteText:
All network connections are encrypted, except for some communications between machines located in the same datacenter.

As a precaution against identity theft in case of data leak, the identity information of Liberapay account owners is stored encrypted in our database.
